name: Tesco Genuine Leather Large Chamois
description: Hand finished natural oil dressed chamois
Gives paintwork a deep and lustrous streak free shine
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave /><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen /></Cooking_Instructions><Directions>Wet the chamois thoroughly in cold water and squeeze out excess. Rinse frequently to avoid dust and grit.</Directions><Care_Instructions>After use, rinse in luke warm soapy water. Do not use harsh detergents or washing soda. Squeeze out excess, spread flat and hang to dry away from direct heat. Do not use this product in hot water and avoid any contact with petroleum products, strong acids or alkalis. Do not store damp and do not keep in a sealed container as this will cause mildew and rot. Allow chamois to air dry, then store in cool dry conditions. Chamois is a natural material so variations in thickness and the surface finish are inherent in the product. This chamois is made from sheep skin.</Care_Instructions>
